original: Essen, Gustaf Harald, kommunal-borgmästare, notarius publicus, Eksjö, f. 15/5/01 i S. Unnaryd, Jönköp. 1., av prov :läk. Gustaf E. o. Anna Linnell. G. 31 m. Lisa Peterson. Barn: Lis-lott f. 32, Jerker 35, Johan 38. — Stud:ex. i Eksjö 19, jur. kand. i Lund 25. Tingstjg. i N. o. S. Vedbo doms. 25-28, stadsfogde i Eksjö 29-40, tf. borgmäst. kort. tider samt 36-40, komm :borgmäst. i Eksjö sed. 41, tillika not. publ. V. auditör v. Jönköp.-Kalmar reg. o. Göta ing:kår sed. 28. Ordf. i byggn:nd, v. ordf. i expropr:-nd i Jönköp. 1., ordf. i styr. f. Eksjö Sparbank samt i direkt, f. vissa stift., led. av hälsov:nd m. fl. ndr o. stj^r. Hobby: havssegling.
translated: Essen, Gustaf Harald, municipal mayor, notary public, Eksjö, born May 15th, 1901 in S. Unnaryd, Jönköping County, son of medical doctor Gustaf E. and Anna Linnell. Married to Lisa Peterson in 1931, with children Lis-lott born in 1932, Jerker in 1935, and Johan in 1938. Completed high school in Eksjö in 1919, received a law degree from Lund University in 1925. Served as magistrate in the North and South Vedbo districts from 1925 to 1928, city bailiff in Eksjö from 1929 to 1940, and acting mayor for short periods as well as from 1936 to 1940. Municipal mayor of Eksjö since 1941, as well as a notary public. Also served as a military prosecutor for the Jönköping-Kalmar regiment and the Göta engineering corps since 1928. Chairman of the building committee, vice chairman of the expropriation committee in Jönköping County, chairman of the board of Eksjö Savings Bank, as well as on the board for certain foundations and a member of various health and other committees and boards. Hobbies include sailing.

jobTitle.name: Military Prosecutor
jobTitle.description: 1928 - Present, Jönköping-Kalmar regiment and Göta engineering corps
